description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
As the master of the School of Unholy Arts and as the undefeated Unmasked Demon, MookHyang unfortunately falls to a strange fantasy world by the magic of his enemies (School of Blood Arts). In the new world of elf, sorcerer, knight, and dragon, MookHyang’s adventure of finding a way back to his old world (Murim) unfolds.

description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

description.ru:
Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

description.en:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…
description.ja:
好きになった子は、宇宙人？
クラス委員長の僕は、ひょんなことからクラスメイトの変人・ハルに惚れてしまう。意を決して告白した僕だったが、彼女の正体は地球に調査に来た宇宙人だった。「それでも好きだ！」とハルと付き合い始めた僕だったが、さらなる“秘密”を抱えることに――。

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en: "Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en: When Madoka learns that her parents gained hundred million yen from the lottery, she does not believe her ears! But she starts to dream of a new life of a princess, To make things worse, they inform her of their decision to pursue their lifelong goal of becoming doctors. What will happen to Madoka who, when deciding to stay behind, is left to fend for herself in a residence of the Asagi family home… For Madoka, a new life starts
description.pt-br:
Madoka é surpreendida ao descobrir que seus pais ganharam na loteria 100.000.000 (um milhão de dólares). Para piorar as coisas eles informam a decisão de seguirem seu sonho e se tornarem médicos.
O que vai acontecer com Madoka? Que, ao decidir ficar para trás, é deixada para cuidar de si mesma em  uma casa de hóspedes de um conhecido da família (do Asagi)?

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

altTitles.ja: 魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.en: A road manga starring a beautiful and ethereal girl, two bad boys and an Okinawa where the signs of the American occupation are the backdrop.
description.es:
Pese a su título, ésta no es una historia erótica sino algo así como una road movie de culto que ya apareció en Francia con el nombre de Next Stop y que pronto logró el estatus de obra de culto tanto en este país como en Japón.

De un tono lírico y con unos fondos absolutamente arrebatadores, Sex nos cuenta la historia de Kaho Saito, una chica etérea, y su relación con Yuki, un oscuro y daltónico joven que se dedica a hacer trapicheos en la isla de Okinawa.

description.en:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of… a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

**Note: Chapters 7-44 are available in the official English release, and will not be uploaded here.**

---

description.en: One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

Although her mother was sometimes abusive, Wakaba's best memories are when they are together at home eating a homemade dinner. However, when Wakaba is abandoned by her only parent, she is left in the care of a distant relative - the young Hinata Kazutomo. Initially unhappy with the arrangement, Wakaba gradually begins to enjoy her time with Kazutomo, who is determined to help heal her wounds and get her back on track.
description.fr: Les meilleurs souvenirs d'enfance de Wakaba sont les repas faits maison de sa maman qu'elles partageaient.  Sa mère étant dépressive, Wakaba se retrouve à la charge du jeune Hinata, un parent trés éloigné.  A la base malheureuse de ce changement, elle commence à s'ouvrir à lui qui est déterminé à panser ses blessures et les siennes par la même occasion…

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going strait toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.

This is a story of Ochou, a shinobi who lives under the name of Kochou, a courtesan, displaying as such in order to hunt other shinobi who have lost their way.

One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…
description.es-la:
Mikoto Urabe es una nueva estudiante transferida a la clase de Akira Tsubaki. Un día después de clases, Akira encuentra a Mikoto dormida en su escritorio. Akira la despierta y le dice que es hora de irse a casa y descubre que ella ha babeado en su escritorio.

Espontáneamente se acerca para tocar la baba y saborearla... a partir de eso, las cosas comienzan a ponerse extrañas.

En este sorprendente y dulce giro en una historia romántica de la escuela secundaria, un chico conoce a una chica y aprenden sobre la vida intima de cada uno a través de su vínculo inusual, y Akira aprende a respetar a Mikoto mientras ella establece un ritmo cuidadoso en el desarrollo de su relación.

description.en:
Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.ja: デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
description.fr:
Depuis 3 ans, le ciel de Tokyo est recouvert par un gigantesque vaisseau spatial extra-terrestre. Pourtant, aucune attaque de la part des extra-terrestres n’est recensée, bien que les humains abattent, avec une facilité déconcertante, les petits vaisseaux qui sortent de temps en temps du ventre de l’immense engin…

Pendant ce temps, sur Terre, les deux amies Kadode et Ôran, comme la majorité des humains, ne prêtent plus attention à ce vaisseau et continuent à vivre leur vie. Mais ces 3 années de paix ont endormi la vigilance de l’Humanité… Elle ne remarque pas que « l’envahisseur » s’est infiltré au sein de sa population. Et il pourrait bientôt troubler leur paisible quotidien !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

K-League Third Division

The protagonist, Ma Jung-woo, is a strategic analyst.

As he suffered from mounting debt, he inherited his late grandfather's British football team without notice.
He tried to sell the club and start a new life...

What? 150 billion won in debt alone?

Jungwoo is trying to pay off his debts alone as the club owner's coach….

While snow was falling on a holy night, a demon with the looks of a young girl traveled into the village and watched the warm people inside their homes. The demon was surprised when an exorcist spoke to her despite the hatred between the two species; immediately the demon became attracted to the exorcist.

A comforting story that brings together humans and demons.
description.es:
En la nevada de una noche sagrada, una demonio con la apariencia de una niña pequeña se encaminó hacia el pueblo y presenció a la gente cálida en sus hogares. La demonio se sorprendió cuando un exorcista le habló a pesar del odio entre sus mutuas especies; inmediatamente, la demonio se vió atraída al exorcista.  
  
Una historia confortable que junta a humanos y demonios.
description.id:
Saat salju turun pada malam natal, Akuma-chan dengan penampilan seorang gadis muda melakukan perjalanan ke desa dan menyaksikan orang-orang dengan suasana hangat di dalam rumah mereka, pertemua antara Akuma-chan dan pemburu iblis pada malam itu membuat sang Akuma-chan menjadi tertarik pada pemburu iblis, apakah yang akan terjadi diantara mereka berdua?

Kisah menghibur yang menyatukan manusia dan iblis.

description.en: Young Mikan runs away to Tokyo to follow her best friend, Hotaru, who has been enrolled in an exclusive, secretive private school for geniuses. But it turns out that Alice Academy is a lot more than meets the eye. If Mikan wants to stay by Hotaru's side, she has to both pass the strange "entrance exam" and face the even greater challenge of befriending her very odd new classmates. Whether it's Hotaru's gift for inventing gadgets, the cranky Natsume's fire-casting ability, or Professor Narumi's control of human pheromones, everyone at the school has some sort of special talent. But what ability, if any, does Mikan possess? Mikan is going to have to rely on her courage and spunk if she's going to stay in school, or even stay alive!
description.pl: Mikan Sakura dorastała u swojego dziadka na wsi w Japonii. Pewnego dnia jej najlepsza przyjaciółka, Hotaru, oświadczyła, że przeniosi się do prestiżowej szkoły w Tokio. Mikan jako jej oddana przyjaciółka bez namysłu za nią podążyła. Szkoła ta jest tak naprawdę elitarną Akademią dla ludzi obdarowanych indywidualną mocą „Alice”. Lecz czy całkiem zwykła Mikan jest w stanie dostać się do tak elitarnej szkoły? Przekonajcie się sami!

description.en:
Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?  
  
Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.

A group of young people tormented by ghosts join hands to find a scientific explanation for their paranormal experiences – and a way out of them. In their desperate quest, they visit a haunted house and encounter a terrifying, blood-thirsty ghost with a tragic past. Will they come out alive? Or will they too become possessed by demon spirits?
Dahye was forced to grow up in a cult by her mother, cut off from the rest of the world. However, she meets a half-sister her age named Yunseo, who is her polar opposite, and meets new people.
description.ko:
어릴 때부터 엄마에게 이끌려 사이비종교에 들어갔던 주인공 다혜는 세상과 단절되어 살다가 
자신과 정반대 성격의 동갑내기 이복자매 윤서와 여러 사람들을 만나게 된다.

altTitles.ja-ro: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.en: The 800-Years-Old Villainess who Possessed a Low-Ranking Lady Peacefully Enjoyed her Youth

altTitles.es-la: La villana de 800 años que posee a una joven de poder bajo disfruta pacíficamente de su juventud

description.en:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
description.ja:
『稀代の悪女』であるノーラ＝ノーズは、その罪により800年もの間封印されている。
そんな彼女の最近の楽しみは、遠視の魔法で学校というものを視ること。
ある日いつものように学校を視ていると、「死にたい……」という助けを求める声が聞こえてきた。
「死にたいと思うなら、あなたの体を私に預けてみない？」
ノーラは声の主であった『枯草令嬢』と呼ばれるシシリーに憑依。
いじめられっ子だった彼女を取り巻く状況を改善させていく！
800年前の最強悪女、ハチャメチャ楽しい青春を過ごす！
description.es-la: Nora Noze, una poderosa maga que fue sellada debido a sus maldades, ha realizado un pacto con la joven Cecily para poseer su cuerpo y vivir su vida durante 1 año. Ahora Nora deberá afrontar la vida diaria de Cecily y de paso disfrutar las experiencias que nunca pudo en su vida pasada.

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Puberty, an All Boys School!? and Nakano-kun

altTitles.ja: 思春期と男子校!?と中野くん

description.en: Hajime Nakano is forced by his mother to enroll at a newly opened all boys high school, and he laments over having to spend the next three years surrounded by other guys. However, he doesn't know that all of the other students are girls secretly pretending to be guys, and each of them think they are the only girl in the whole school.
A series of 4koma comics featuring Osage-chan by Nukunuku Nigirimeshi (@NKNK_NGRMS).

altTitles.ja: カワイイなんて聞いてない！！

altTitles.zh: 我才没听说过他这么可爱！！

altTitles.vi: Tôi chưa từng biết rằng cậu ấy lại dễ thương tới vậy

description.en:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
description.fr:
Madoka est obsédée par les mangas shoujo, en particulier ceux mettant en scène de jeunes hommes innocents tombant amoureux de leur Senpai. Elle devrait être ravie lorsqu'un magnifique kohai commence à travailler dans le restaurant de son père, sauf qu'il est impoli et distant, ne voulant rien avoir à faire avec elle. Cependant, quand elle le protège contre des fans trop insistants, il réalise qu'il a peut-être trouvé quelqu'un capable de faire tomber ses barrières...!

---
Madoka est une lycéenne qui adore les jeunes garçons mignons. Un jour, Shikura arrive comme employé à temps partiel dans le diner de ses parents ! Shikura est beau et séduisant, mais il n'est pas très gentil ?! Elle pensait ne jamais l'apprécier, mais la façon dont il regarde parfois est douloureusement mignonne ! Comment ne pourrait-elle pas vraiment l'aimer ?!

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.zh-hk: 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事

altTitles.en: How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

description.en: A captivating beauty who stirs up trouble (top) x A fallen genius who destroys all obstacles (bottom)! In the cultivation world, where only dual-cultivation can recharge and replenish spiritual energy, It's hard to be a top, especially one coveted by everyone. It's hard to be a bottom, but it's hardest to be a domineering bottom who forces the top into dual-cultivation!

Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

altTitles.th: ราตรีที่ไร้เงา

description.en:
*Beware, for the shadow speaks.*

When junior knight Roselyn is rescued from the bottom of a cliff after an ambush by an enemy kingdom, her brother Calix is relieved – that is, until he learns that she's lost her memory. Now, she behaves like a child, eats like a horse, and wields unbelievable strength. But something's not quite right...

---
When you enter the deep forest, you will be devoured by the shadow. The shadow in the forest moves when no one is looking. In the deep forest, there is a shadow that mimics humans. The shadow speaks.

Rosalin of the White Night Chivalric Order went missing after suffering from an unexpected enemy attack during a hunting competition. They were able to find her unconscious and heavily wounded under a cliff, but when she woke up a few days later, she was rendered incapable of even simple speech due to acute amensia.

She roamed around the house, barefoot in her pyjamas, and spoke without honorifics. She would even eat food off the floor!

She’s bizarre, no matter how you look at it. Is this truly Rosalin?

---

狩猟大会で敵国の襲撃を受けて行方不明になった｢白い夜｣騎士団のロゼリーン。 大怪我を負い、意識不明のロゼリーンが崖の下で発見されたが、数日後に目を…

description.th: ค่ำคืนในงานประลองล่าสัตว์ เกิดเหตุลอบสังหารเชื้อพระวงศ์ขึ้นโดยมีเป้าหมายคือ 'ริคาร์ดิส' เจ้าชายลำดับที่ 2 ทำให้อัศวินในหน่วยราตรีพิสุทธิ์ล้มตายมากรวมถึง 'โรซาลีน' แห่งตระกูลกงล้อสีชาดที่บาดเจ็บหนักด้วยเช่นกัน ในระหว่างที่นางกำลังนอนรอความตายนางก็ได้พบกับ 'เงา' นางจึงขอร้องให้ 'เงา' ช่วยสานต่อความตั้งใจของนางนั่นคือการปกป้อง 'นายท่านแห่งราตรีพิสุทธิ์' จึงเกิดเป็นพันธสัญญาต้องห้ามขึ้นมา
description.tr:
Ormanın derinlerine inerseniz acımasız gölge tarafından yakalanıp canlı canlı yenilirsiniz. İnsanların girmeye cesaret edemediği bu ormandaki gölge hareket eder, insanı taklit eder ve konuşur..
Beyaz Gece Şövalyelerinden Rosalin, bir av yarışması sırasında beklenmedik bir düşman saldırısına uğradıktan sonra ansızın kayboldu. Bir uçurumun altında baygın ve ağır yaralı hâlde bulundu. Birkaç gün sonra uyandığında ise akut amnezi (geçici hafıza kaybı) nedeniyle konuşamaz hâle geldi.
Evin içinde pijamalarıyla dolaşıyor, saygısızca konuşuyor, bir leydiye yakışmayacak hareketler yapıyordu. Yerden aldığı yemeği bile yiyecek duruma gelmişti!
Nereden bakarsanız bakın çok tuhaf biri olmuştu. Bu gerçekten Rosalin mi?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/809023066), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/809031210)

[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885010321)

description.uk:
Розелін, лицар Білої ночі, зникла безвісти після того, як на неї напали ворожі сили під час мисливського змагання. Її знайшли без свідомості, поранену, лежачу під скелею. Розелін прокинулася через кілька днів та, здавалося, зовсім втратила пам’ять. Їй було важко говорити навіть простими словами. Дівчину знаходили босоніж у піжамі, неформально розмовляючи тут і там. Вона навіть збирала їжу з підлоги!

Вона дивна дівчина, як не глянь. Це справді Розелін?

---
